title: Flex border reward?
body:
What are the flex rewards?

DOes it reward a border?

replies.body: The season has just started and no rewards have been announced, which may likely be the case until we draw closer to the end.  Per the [Season 7 update](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-2017/ranked), rewards are expected through either or both modes.  Good luck!
